EmailTemplate.name: 202010_APAC_BGA_Connected-Cockpit-and-Cabin-Series-2020_Webinar_20-October.Remin
EmailTemplate.subject: Webinar Tomorrow: Honeywell Forge – Connected Aircraft
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Webinar for Business Aviation Operators – The Connected Cockpit and Cabin Series 2020
Join host Tim Xu and the Honeywell Forge team for a virtual webinar that covers what’s new and what’s next with the connected aircraft. In the half-day session, you’ll hear from the Honeywell product team, industry partners and business aviation peers on the state of the industry, what’s new with Honeywell Forge and see roadmaps for the future.
Topics Covered in the Webinar
- Upward trends in business aviation - Honeywell Forge product strategy and market developments - New experience plans and cybersecurity solutions - Flight services partnerships and Integrations - Roadmaps from Inmarsat, Iridium and Viasat
Who the session was built for
- Directors of Maintenance, Maintenance Personnel - Chief Pilots, Pilots - Schedulers, Dispatcher - Directors of Aviation - Leadership and Principles
DATE Tuesday, October 20, 2020
TIME 9:00 am – 12:45 pm (UTC+8)
LOCATION Online and On-Demand
HOSTED BY Tim Xu and Adrien Yip
LIMITED TIME PROMO Tune in to get information on a special, limited time offer from Honeywell.
REGISTER NOW <[[https://honeywell.zoom.us/webinar/register/WN_UbcWSmg8TSKhCFPZlLinuA]]>
Tim Xu Honeywell Forge Director Sales, APAC, Business Aviation (852) 6589 0860 tim.xu@honeywell.com <[[mailto:tim.xu@honeywell.com]]>
